name: Zerocoma
goal: The activity of ZeroComa focuses on the development and commercialization of applications that solve the needs of companies that are obliged to comply with the regulatory framework, not only in Spain but also in the EU.
interests: Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Among the main mandatory rules in Spain that are resolved with applications developed by ZeroComa, we find electronic invoicing to public administrations, the submission of invoicing records to the Tax Agency for VAT control, the mandatory electronic notifications of the Tax Agency and other public bodies, the generation of ENI (National Interoperability Scheme) documents to allow interoperability between public administrations, .....
But in addition and to facilitate SMEs the transformation of administrative processes, ZeroComa has developed certified scanning applications that guarantee the authenticity and integrity of documents converted from paper to electronic support, provides users with third-party OCR engines for automatic extraction of the information and with all this, is able to make the accounting entries in the most widespread accounting applications in the Spanish market.
